page.title: 16Life in Brock' 3
page.content: The residents of the village were then asked to highlight some of the points of social concern to residents. {21}families felt the need for a {Recreation Centre}in the village and were glad to see that the tertiary college is to expand the use of its facilities. {9}families would like to see a permanent library to replace the existing mobile library van. Several other suggestions were made, including:-{Benches,Car Parks,Roller {Disco, Zebra {Crossings,Theatre,Cinema,Coffee {Shop,Information Centre,Ice {Rink,Tennis Courts,Street Cleaner}etc but none received overwhelming support from those interviewed.
